frontmatter.title: Perfect and Profitable Niche Ideas For Your Personal Blog (100+ proven Ideas)

markdownRemark.html:
Want to be a fantastic blogger? Blogging is known as one of the popular trendy professions of recent times. You love the idea of starting a blog. But…you’re not sure what to write about.

Or maybe you have an idea, but you’re not sure if it will work or Looking for some of the best blog niches to make money?. Sound familiar?

Yes?

Keep reading!

Choosing the perfect blog niche is tough. You may have the following questions in your mind, like:

  • What is the most money-making blog niche?
  • How can I make money with my blog?
  • How can I pick the perfect name for my blog?
  • What are the most famous blog topics?
  • What should I blog about to keep me interested?

And all questions you should think about!

Remember: every successful blogger started with nothing. For most of them, initial niche got changed to something else as per the demand.

Now, if you’re starting, you’ve probably heard or read advice like:

  • You need to be passionate about your blog topic.
  • You must have a drastic knowledge of the topic.
  • You must position yourself as an expert in a field you love.

but this, not the whole truth. Because the thing is:

There are tons of great blog niche ideas out there that allow you to make money even if you’re not too passionate about them.

In fact, you can make money in almost any blog niche you decide to enter.

Some niches are easier to monetize than others. But mostly, any niche where you can find and solve a problem your readers are going to be successful.

In this post, I’ll share profitable blog topic ideas that you can make money with – starting now!

Let’s jump right in!

Here are the 10 Best Blog Niches that can Help You to Make Money in 2020 and in 2021.

You may be interested in!:

If you are looking for learning some tricks and tips on 'How to search blog niche'. Read here.

1. Technical Blog

Technology is developing every day. People want to get updates on the new launch and changes in technology every day. This has become one of the hot blog niches.

Technology is not restricted to professional tech updates. It can be anything like, If you are passionate about the latest gadgets and exploring the latest tech, you should start a tech blog.

Your aim should be to attract and impress the audiences by giving out your knowledge of the technology and relevant area. Every week, hundreds of tech companies are developing and releasing products and this is growing every day.

Therefore, you won’t face a lack of content to provide to your viewers. Let's go deeper into the technology niche and find out some hot topics for this category.

  • The latest Software's (Again a whole category Editing tools, Accounting software, etc...)
  • PC games
  • Latest Gadgets
  • New Programming Languages
  • Innovation (Like SpaceX is doing)
  • Mobile Devices
  • Laptops and Computers
  • Supporting devices for Computer and Mobile (Like New Printer, or maybe a camera)
  • Operating systems
  • Mobile games
  • Mobile Apps

Your target audience will be looking for the latest technology news and want your blog to be the place where they can find everything related to technology.

If you are able to recognize the latest tech available in the market and educate your viewers on budget and practical specifications, you will become their hub for tech-related things.

Reviews of the latest products are very much in demand as viewers tend to gain more knowledge about the products either for interest of when they are buying any product.

2. Digital Marketing Blog

One of the most trending professions in this modern world is digital marketing.

Digital marketing have significant increment in the job opportunity. With the advancement in technology, the digital space has rapidly grown.

Digital marketing is one of the demanding blog niches. A lot of people are searching to brush up their digital marketing expertise. Businesses are now working to refresh their online presence.

The advantages of implementing expert digital marketing strategies for your business are infinite.

Digital marketing consists of all the marketing done via the website, search engines, social media, mobile applications, etc. Creating a digital marketing blog not only helps you to make money but will also enable you to learn more and apply it yourself.

You can create a blog on sub-niches such as social media marketing, web designing, web optimization, search engine optimization, mobile marketing, email marketing, video marketing, etc. or on micro-niche such as Twitter marketing, Designing using HTML, or Niche research etc.

By giving out more information regarding the changes in the algorithms of different search engines and social media platforms, you can attract audiences.

Educating your audience on how to conduct market analysis and developing business strategies will also help to build a positive following.

3. Finance and Investment Blog

Finance and Investment always a major part of the world and are going to have the same importance for every generation. This field is constantly growing and evolving, as there are tons of ways to make money, and people are exploring all of the options available.

This is one of the blog niches that need to be researched more and provide more options to invest. Having knowledge of personal finance, stock market, foreign exchange market, etc can prove to a boost to your blog.

Reviewing financial products, investment schemes, and ideas can be a good way to attract an audience. Helping people by telling them new methods of earning, by teaching them about passive income, methods of saving, and multiplying their money can prove to be fruitful for you, and your blog both.

Creating a blog that compares and reviews different currencies, showing conversions, and provide them historical data can also boost your traffic. Analyzing stock market instruments and drifts are influential topics that are vividly looked upon by readers.

4. Fashion and Beauty Blog

Choosing a fashion or a beauty niche is a bigger step, as it requires to be updated almost every day. But this have a best thing associated with it that a fashion blog will never go obsolete till the world alive.

The fashion or the beauty blog are one of those blog niches that can never go out of trend. Style is all about what and how we are wearing it. If you want to start your own blog, the fashion niche is highly profitable as this have lots of affiliation options available.

Whether you want to keep it simple or prefer fancy, all of us have made investments in fashion and beauty. It can covers the clothes we wear, the cosmetics, perfumes, accessories as well as how popular names are inspiring our fashion.

People love to invest money in looking good and often seek guidance over the internet to know out the latest trends. This is where you can jump in and give solutions and help them with their queries. Start a blog and write informative posts about trends in fashion, new releases, major fashion weeks, and more.

Don’t just simply repeat what’s out there; share your unique view of stories related to fashion. You can sub-categorize it further into fashion trends and beauty and cosmetics. This would widen your niche and help you to attract a wide range of audiences.

5. Traveling or Traveler Blog

This is one of the most exciting blog niches as traveling is a desire of most people nowadays. People stay busy with their workload, job, business, stress, and big-city hassles.

The travel niche is the right fit for you if you’re excited about traveling & curious about new experiences. Traveling is relaxing for many people, and for travel destinations and tips, you can be their go-to-person. People who love to see the world and write about it manage the best travel blogs.

When you can’t afford to travel yet, you can vicariously relive other people’s experiences. You need to fine-tune your skills in analysis and storytelling.

You must also show the secret beauty of the finest locations. Guest writers can also be engaged to share their travel experiences. There are many hacks and tips for traveling that encourage travelers on the road to save money.

You should write informative blog posts for travelers.

For example, you can write on topics like how to save money while traveling or how to prevent scams from travel agents or what are the places are must to visit but not so popular.

You can also educate people on how to take advantage of discount deals, Hotels deals, and cash rewards. You can write guides that help backpackers plan and travel soundly. You can conduct many surveys or extract information from review websites and write extensive reviews of these airlines and travel companies.

6. Relationship and Marriage Advice Blog

When you think about how many people are in the world today searching the internet to find that special someone online? However, it’s not just about finding someone, it’s also about making sure they are advised best on the relationship. For times like these, many individuals will seek the advice of top relationship websites and blogs on the internet.

We’re social creatures and most of us crave for things that only relationships can offer. Even though a significant number of married couples turn to divorce lawyers at some point in their lives, divorce hasn’t stopped people from remarrying.

Here are some statistics according to the US Census Bureau.

  • In 1996, 43 percent of marriages in the year prior to the survey involved at least one spouse who was remarrying.
  • Percentages for the 2001 and 2004 panels are 38 percent and 36 percent, respectively.
  • Of men and women who married for the second or third time in the year prior to the interview, 91 percent were remarrying after being divorced, and 9 percent were

So yes, there will always be an audience for relationship blogs, whether people get married or not. If you’re looking at this niche, it is best to learn from the best – the best relationship blogs.

If advising about relationships is what you’re good at, and you know you can bring something to the table, go for it! Although, there is lot of competition. Do take a look at some of the best relationship blogs first, though. Do your homework so that you have a solid foundation to build on.

The Gottman Institute blog are on the #1 position because there advice is based on science and psychology. Dr. John Gottman and his colleagues have spent decades studying couples and identifying behaviors that place a couple at risk for divorce. Seriously, this is one of the best blogs on marriage.

Transparent and honest, Casey and Meygan’s website, Marriage365.org, is filled with advice for finding hope for your marriage and all kinds of ways to “date” your spouse again.

Fierce Marriage -Married for over a decade, Ryan and Selena first started their blog to help them process through marriage’s trials as well as celebrate its joys. It’s become an amazing resource for every couple!

7. Psychology and Science Blogs

If you are the kind of blogger who prefers just the facts, this is for you.

Starting a psychology blog comes with several benefits that can help propel your career and provide content to people interested in becoming psychologists — in addition to helping non-psychologists understand themselves better.

Starting a psychology blog can be a valuable asset to your career as well. Not only it can lead to more clients, but it can also help you get noticed in your field and get featured on other websites. This, in turn, can lead to speaking engagements and more.

Even if your are interested in Science and Phycology and wants to pursue for interest purpose, Its a great niche that can earn for you well.

Andrew D Wilson and Sandra Golenko — Notes from Two Scientific Psychologists

Notes from Two Scientific Psychologists is, not surprisingly, a blog run by two psychologists, Andrew D Wilson and Sandra Golenko who used their blog posts to publish several papers and appear in various interviews on well-established sites and podcasts like Mind Hacks and The Psych Files. They blog about dynamical systems and embodied cognition with popular posts like:

  • Are we Information-Processers? — explains why information is processed and why it doesn’t have to be transformed into a behavior.
  • On Why fMRI Is Bullshit – this post explains why Wilson thinks that fMRI is a waste of time.
  • Some Ground Rules for a Theory of Psychology — explains the authors’ perspective on cognitive psychology and embodied condition.

Use the advice above to launch your psychology blog and make the most of it. Good luck!

8. Movie and Music Blog

Movies and music are most popular industry and part of everyone’s life. In the busy routine of today’s modern world, movies and music provide relaxation, make people calm. If you have passion for music/movies, and you have good knowledge of these, you should start writing.

You can create a blog for reviewing the music/movie, and the latest releases. Don’t write what everyone thinks or just positive feedback. Share your original views and honest opinions, either its positive or negative. This will attract a loyal followings.

There are many genres in movies as well as music. This gives you a wide variety to create content and you will never face lack of content. Having a passion for music can be very beneficial to your blog. Giving out reviews of different music instruments can attract a large audience, although this can be also be part of hobbies category that we will explain later. People also check reviews and recommendations of new movies before going to watch it.

The movie industry is quite extensive. So if you are trying to write about anything or everything pertaining to movies would not make your blog successful, hence you have to find your niche. You have to decide what part of the movie industry you want to critically review, is it Hollywood blockbusters, Bollywood movies, experimental movies, Broadway etc. A good research and introspective thinking could help you achieve this.

Giving a right opinion of the movies, recommendations of best or must to watch movie or can even provide summary can assist you in gaining a loyal audience.

9. Health and Fitness Blog

One of the most looked up and popular blog niches over the internet is a health and fitness blog. The health and fitness industry has diversified its activities since the rise of the internet and has clear ways to reach and communicate online with its audience. The health and fitness blogs have many micro niche such as yoga, meditation, gym, exercise, weight gain, weight loss, diet etc.

The need to stay fit means that people will always look for procedures of anti-aging, diet strategies, work out schemes and more. There’s a ton of competition out there, especially in the health and fitness industry. In fact, recent reports discovered that the wellness market is growing at a historic rate (12.8% in the last two years), nearly twice as fast as the global economy.

This is a major reason health is one of the most profitable blog niches. There’s massive traffic in this field. The good thing about blogging in the health and wellness niche is that you don’t have to be a trainer or a medical professional with credentials.

If you’re serious about learning and providing answers, even without these qualifications, you will make it big in the health and fitness niche. Health and fitness is an extensive topic. You won’t have to waste time finding content.

Write a comprehensive review surrounding every perspective of the product and let your audience know exactly what to expect from using these items.

Create blogs that concentrate on food and diet. To inspire and empower your audience, you can also share stories about weight loss. You can create a blog for everyone that focuses on posting healthier food recipes.

Share information on food, strength training, psychological preparation, and facilities. Share tips on fighting stress and tidying their lives. Teach readers how to care for their skin while recommending daily use of beneficial skincare products.

This would help you to attract targeted audience.

10. News Blog

News Blog is one of the blog niches that will never go out of trend. Its a huge niche, especially when it is focused on trending topics, news blogs have a high potential for engagement.

News is a never-ending topic, and so there is no shortage of content. Posting the latest news is the best way to gain instant traffic to your blog. There are many sub-categories that you can share your opinion on. You can share the latest news on politics, sports, entertainment, finance, international news, etc.

Not only can you share about the current affairs but also cover interesting stories that can attract a wide range of audiences.

11. Food Blog

One of the more interesting and appealing blog niches is a food blog.

Everyone loves to eat food. There are a large number of cuisines. Creating a food blog is a fun task for someone passionate about food. Food is one of the most popular topics and creating a food blog will attract a huge audience. It is an extensive topic that can never lack content.

You will obtain a decent amount of organic traffic from recipe posts if you have a specific food blog. As a collaboration, you can review food from various restaurants.

Sharing the appropriate feedback will help your blog and will build a positive relationship with your audience. Sharing videos of food recipes and also giving out tips and hacks of cooking food easily will also help you to engage more with your followers.

12. Personal Development and Career Blog

One of the most underestimated blog niches is personal development.

In today’s highly competitive world, people look to develop and become better in every aspect of life. As a blogger in the niche of personal development, your job is to provide content tailored to individuals seeking further education in their desired field.

If you are an expert in a specific field, start a blog regarding that field and post content dedicatedly to growing in that field. Public speaking and leadership are important things in any profession, yet many people are struggling with them.

You can share the secrets of professional development that will assist your viewers to build relationships and impact from the very beginning.

13. Some more options-

  1. Fitness and Sports blog
  2. Hobbies
  3. Food blog
  4. Gaming Blog
  5. Social networks
  6. Books Review
  7. Stories
  8. Space
  9. Programming etc.

Conclusion

Blogging has become a profession for many, and earning money through blogging has also become easier. There are many answers that people seek.

If analyzed appropriately, you can lead a successful blog. Start your journey of blogging with something you connect deeply.

Be patient and passionate, and you will be rewarded for your hard work. A whole blog niche list has been mentioned, while whole other topics are yet to be discovered.

For a start, you can definitely use some of the blog niches that are analyzed above.

If you still have questions regarding Niche or Niche Marketing, feel free to ask your questions in the comments section below.
